Function Documentation

void euclideanDistance ( CvPoint2D32f *  point1,
CvPoint2D32f *  point2,
float *  match,
int  nPts 
)

Calculates euclidean distance between the point pairs.

Parameters:
point1 Array of points. Pairs with point2 at every Position.
point2 Array of points. Pairs with point1 at every Position.
match Output: Contains the result of the distance calculation. Must have the length of nPts.
nPts Number of pairs.

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void initImgs (  ) 

Needed before start of trackLK and at the end of the program for cleanup. Handles PYR(Pyramid cache) variable.

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void normCrossCorrelation ( IplImage *  imgI,
IplImage *  imgJ,
CvPoint2D32f *  points0,
CvPoint2D32f *  points1,
int  nPts,
char *  status,
float *  match,
int  winsize,
int  method 
)

Calculates normalized cross correlation for every point.

Parameters:
imgI Image 1.
imgJ Image 2.
points0 Array of points of imgI
points1 Array of points of imgJ
nPts Length of array/number of points.
status Switch which point pairs should be calculated. if status[i] == 1 => match[i] is calculated. else match[i] = 0.0
match Output: Array will contain ncc values. 0.0 if not calculated.
winsize Size of quadratic area around the point which is compared.
method Specifies the way how image regions are compared. see cvMatchTemplate

Here is the caller graph for this function:

int trackLK ( IplImage *  imgI,
IplImage *  imgJ,
float  ptsI[],
int  nPtsI,
float  ptsJ[],
int  nPtsJ,
int  level,
float *  fb,
float *  ncc,
char *  status 
)

Tracks Points from 1.Image to 2.Image. Need initImgs before start and at the end of the program for cleanup.

Parameters:
imgI previous Image source. (isn't changed)
imgJ actual Image target. (isn't changed)
ptsI points to track from first Image. Format [0] = x1, [1] = y1, [2] = x2 ...
nPtsI number of Points to track from first Image
ptsJ container for calculated points of second Image. Must have the length of nPtsI.
nPtsJ number of Points
level Pyramidlevel, default 5
fb forward-backward confidence value. (corresponds to euclidean distance between). Must have the length of nPtsI: nPtsI * sizeof(float).
ncc normCrossCorrelation values. needs as inputlength nPtsI * sizeof(float)
status Indicates positive tracks. 1 = PosTrack 0 = NegTrack needs as inputlength nPtsI * sizeof(char)

Based Matlab function: lk(2,imgI,imgJ,ptsI,ptsJ,Level) (Level is optional)
